title: Macbook pro 15 2015 a1398 video glitches each second
message:
Macbook pro 15 2015 (IG) a1398  video glitches all the time each second. 
The video is fine on external monitor, resting NVRAM & PRAM does not help. 
Problem is there when booting to safe mode or linux from USB drive. Other then the screen scrambling issue it works fine.  

See video to see the problem: [MEDIA=youtube]wAtcP6yDCDg[/MEDIA]

Any help much appreciated. 
Thanks.
